title: Tadej Pogačar Is Racing Paris-Roubaix 2025, and He’s Likely to Win It, Too. Here’s Why.
content:
Yes, the 67kg Tour de France champion could beat Van der Poel over the bruising cobbles of Roubaix. But he'll need good legs, better luck, and a blessing from the weather gods.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Is Racing Paris-Roubaix 2025, and He’s Likely to Win It, Too. Here’s Why. on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
